attributes.action: Make politicians and campaigners  accountable for their claims and promises!
attributes.additional_details: Politicians and campaigners should have their facts checked before being published and there should be real consequences when they are unable to fulfil the majority of their promises.
attributes.background: In the recent referendum and elections, too many claims and "facts" have been unfounded or completely false. Promises are also often dishonoured leaving the public feeling defrauded.

rejection.details:
It's not clear what you mean by accountability. We think you want the same action as this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/119416
